summary: This mod adds new diverse npcs, races, warpaints, and near lore-friendly armor to almost every generic enemy group such as bandits, forsworn, and warlocks.
author: HellLizard

files.name: Beast Bandits V1-2 Quick Patch
files.changelogHtml:
HighElf Hunter no longer sounds like a Hagraven
Random City Thief is now actually random
3 Argonian Males switched to use Male voice
Added Optional Files
